title: Software Developer 2021-U-817 NEW!
full_description: Join ICES on a new contract supporting USGS as a Software Developer. These positions are located in Denver, CO. As a Software Developer, specific responsibilities include, but are not limited to:Duties:•    Code software applications to adhere to designs supporting internal business requirements or external customers•     Standardize the quality assurance procedure for software•     Oversee testing and developRequired Qualifications:•    Bachelor’s degree in a related technical or scientific field•    Minimum 5 years demonstrated experience in the field or related areaDesired Qualifications:•    Master’s degree or higher in related technical or scientific fields•    Prior experience supporting USGS programs
